channel.title: The Great Cases of the 90s Series on YANWE
channel.description: Recent content in The Great Cases of the 90s Series on YANWE

item.title: Shaanxi Ghost Train Station, Section 1 (The Act of Murder is Sacred)
item.description: “Murder is sacred”: he is the only criminal with the word “ghost” in his criminal file! Killing is ritualistic! “Why does everyone tell me that I can’t stay longer at the train station?” This is a question that many people have asked. Let’s say an answer in my mind: because it is haunted and murderous! This is also a real event that happened many years ago. Putting aside the superstition, it is really haunted!

item.title: The Headless Corpse on the Flagpole, Section 1 (Murderer, Me!)
item.description: “Murderer, Me!” : He was extremely twisted and played a provocative game with the police with his bizarre and sadistic methods of killing! Do you know how scary it is to be friends with a man with a twisted mind? He has a theory of his own, and whether it’s right or wrong, it’s irrefutable! If you look at you, he will change the way to be good to you, even he can not use the things to give you.
